Sammy and Ray, turtles and friends forever, are enjoying the coral, with plenty of water and sand, and teaching the newly hatched Ricky and Ella swimming. When suddenly, a hunter appears and takes them to be part of a spectacular aquatic show in Dubai. The seahorse and king of the hill Big D recruits for their project of escape. Sammy and Ray begin to devise their own plan to escape with his new friends, Jimbo - a fish-eyed ball, Annabel - a lobster full of energy, sweet octopus and a whole family of penguins when little Ricky and Ella arrive determined to rescue them. After a series of thrilling adventures and escapes frantic, our heroes go south to find Shelly, the first and only love Sammy.
